text: Colts Cricket Club, based in Colombo, has been active since 1873. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Major League Tournament which they have won six times, most recently in 2011â€“12. Their home ground is the Colts Cricket Club Ground in the Havelock Town district of Colombo. ==References== Category:First-class cricket teams in Sri Lanka Category:1873 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Colts Cricket Club
